archimate:BusinessProcess.name: (L2)(oar) SR1. Manage Data collection and acquisition
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: - Allow the input of all information during production, (Operation, Shifting Event, â€¦) - Allow the input of information coming from connected devices (IoT) - Track resources associated with producing the production unit (production tools, machines, breakdowns, material shortage, etc.). - Wharehousing
